    #include <bits/stdc++.h>
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
    char arr[4][4];
    for (int i = 0;i < 4; i++) {
    for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
    cin >> arr[i][j];
    }
    }
    int a = 0;
    int b = 0;
    for (int i = 0;i < 4; i++) {
    for (int j =0; j < 4; j++) {
    a = 0;
    b = 0;
    if (i + 1 < 4 && j + 1 < 4) {
    for (int k = i; k < i+2; k++) {
    for (int l = j; l < j+2; l++) {
    if (arr[k][l] == 'a') {
    a++;
    } else {
    b++;
    }
    }
    }
    //cout << a << " " << b << endl;
    if (a != 2 || b != 2) {
    cout << "POSSIBLE" << endl;
    return 0;
    }
    }
    }
    }
    cout << "NOT POSSIBLE" << endl;
    return 0;
    }
